message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase [product name]. It's a truly exceptional piece with a value I believe is significant. I'm proposing a price of $1500000. Let me know your thoughts on this offer.

Thank you for offering the [product name], I appreciate the uniqueness of the item. However, considering my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the proposed price. Would you consider accepting $1400000 for the product?

Bob, I understand your perspective. While I appreciate your offer, $1400000 is unfortunately below what I can accept at this time. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1450000 to reflect your budget constraints.  I believe this price remains fair considering the exceptional value of [product name].

I've considered your proposal carefully, Alice. While I understand the value of the [product name], I'm still working within a specific budget. I would like to propose a price of $1425000. This reflects a compromise that I hope will be acceptable to you.
